In the paragraph, "the amount of precurarizing dose" refers to the quantity of a substance (rocuronium) being administered, but it does not directly refer to a chemical entity. The words "significantly longer" and "P < 0.001" are statistical results and do not represent chemical entities either. Therefore, only succinylcholine and rocuronium are valid chemical entities in the paragraph.
